Isak Tangis Keluarga Iringi Prosesi Pemakaman Afridza Munandar
05 Nov 2019, 12:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Jenazah pebalap muda Indonesia, Afridza Munandar, dimakamkan di tempat pemakaman keluarga di Kampung Sambong Bencoy, Kecamatan Mangkubumi, Kota Tasikmalaya, Jawa Barat, Senin malam (4/11/2019). Afridza meninggal dunia usai kecelakaan dalam balapan Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup 2019 di Sirkuit Sepang, Malaysia.
Ribuan warga ikut menyaksikan kedatangan jenazah Afridza ke Tasikmalaya. Mobil ambulans yang membawa almarhum disambut warga dan keluarga sejak memasuki kota sampai ke rumah duka di Tamansari Indah. Peti yang membawa jenazahnya, dibawa ke teras rumah. Keluarga dan warga mengucapkan doa dan tahlil dengan isak tangis.
Sejumlah pejabat perwakilan dari Pemerintah Provinsi Jabar dan Pemerintah Kota Tasikmalaya hadir saat kedatangan jenazah Afridza kemudian ikut doa bersama. Jenazah selanjutnya dibawa ke Masjid Al-Muttaqin yang berada di lingkungan perumahan tersebut, untuk kemudian dibawa ke pemakaman keluarga.

The Family's Sobs Isringi Funeral Procession Afridza Munandar
05 Nov 2019, 12:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The body of a young Indonesian racer, Afridza Munandar, is buried in a family burial site in Kampong Sambong Bencoy, Mangkubumi District, Tasikmalaya City, West Java, Monday night (4/11/2019). Afridza died after an accident in the 2019 Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup race at the Sepang Circuit, Malaysia.
Thousands of residents witnessed the arrival of Afridza's body to Tasikmalaya. Ambulances that brought the deceased were welcomed by residents and families from entering the city to the funeral home in Tamansari Indah. The chest that carried his body, was taken to the terrace of the house. Families and residents say their prayers and tahlil with sobs.
A number of representative officials from the West Java Provincial Government and the Tasikmalaya City Government were present at the arrival of Afridza's body and then joined in prayer together. The body was then taken to the Al-Muttaqin Mosque in the residential neighborhood, and then taken to the family funeral.
